name: Paragalago orinus
description: The Uluguru bushbaby, also known as the mountain dwarf galago or the Amani dwarf galago, is a species of primate in the family Galagidae. Like all galagos, it is a strepsirrhine primate. It is endemic to the Eastern Arc Mountains of Kenya and Tanzania at altitudes of 1,200â€“2,000 m. It has its own set of unique calls, which helps distinguish it from other species of bushbaby.
